title: Açaí Manager
extendedDescription: Açaí Management System is a comprehensive business management application developed during the Object-Oriented Programming course at UFERSA. It provides a complete digital solution for managing açaí store operations.

features.name: CRUD Operations
features.description: Management capabilities for customers, orders, products, and employees.

features.name: Invoice Generation
features.description: Automated invoice creation for individual orders.

features.name: Comprehensive Reporting
features.description: Detailed reports for orders within flexible time periods.
